title: FADA plans to take up issue of high inventory with SIAM
description: The Federation of Automobile Dealers' Association (FADA) expressed concerns over high inventory levels and plans to discuss the issue with the Society of Indian Automobile Manufacturers (SIAM). FADA President Manish Singhania highlighted challenges faced by dealers, emphasizing the need for continuity in policies like FAME-3 and infrastructure development. Singhania noted that high inventory levels can impact dealerships negatively, especially if they exceed 30 days. He urged for collaboration with SIAM to address the issue and emphasized the importance of maintaining manageable inventory levels to avoid a repeat of the challenges faced in 2018-19.
